titles.title: A bill to amend section 324 of title 32, United States Code, to permit the Secretary of the Army and the Secretary of the Air Force to defer the discharge of an officer of the National Guard when such officer becomes 64 years of age.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.
Referred to Subcommittee on Military Personnel and Compensation.

bill.summary: 8/11/1988--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the Army or the Secretary of the Air Force to defer the required discharge of an officer at 64 years of age when such deferment is in the interest of the National Guard.
